results.title: Conditioning the Athlete to Prevent Sport Injuries
results.brief_description: This documentary examines methods of training that are important for the prevention of injuries. It examines the chemical balance of the muscles associated with the different activities and is of interest to athletes and coaches.

results.title: Conditioned reflexes
results.creator_credit: Moscow Popular Science Film Studio, Brandon Films and Artkino Pictures
results.brief_description: Reviews some of the work of the Russian physiologist, Ivan Pavlov, whose experiments with conditioned reflexes paved the way to a better understanding of human and animal behaviour. The difference between blind instinct present in all animals from birth, and reflex reactions set up by conditioning to certain often repeated stimuli is made clear. The process of checking the reflexes is explained and its application in the treatment of certain neuroses in human beings is shown.

results.title: Concrete practice
results.brief_description: SUMMARY:The film examines formwork in building construction andiscusses the problems caused by pressure when concrete is placed etc. Handling and storage of formwork as well as the application of release agents are also demonstrated.

results.title: Concrete poetry
results.brief_description: Presents , against an interpretive visual and musical background, several works selected from an anthology of concrete poetry compiled by Emmett Williams, in order to demonstrate a new poetic form. The poets include: Ronaldo Azeredo, Carlo Belloli, Claus Bremer, Bob Cobbing, Ian Hamilton Finlay, Oecio pignatori, and Emmett Williams.

results.title: Concrete pipes and pre-stressed products
results.brief_description: The manufacture of reinforced concrete products at Hume’s plant in Victoria. Welding the reinforcing for a concrete pipe and casting the pipe; preparing the reinforcing for slabs, beams and piles; pouring concrete and settling it with a mechanical vibrator; curing the concrete; transporting the finished goods to the site.

results.title: Concrete pays
results.creator_credit: Drayton Film Productions and British Information Services
results.brief_description: The use of concrete can help farmers achieve greater efficiency, safety and hygiene. Deals with its use on farms for roads, yards and block-walling, insulated floors and the correct methods to be used in such work by inexperienced farm labour. Uses of cement based paints are also shown.

results.title: Concrete on the farm: making good concrete
results.brief_description: Making good concrete improvements on the farm. Strong, durable, economical and fireproof, they improve the property in value and appearance. Step by step, we follow the methods of concreting a holding yard for pigs; the selection, testing and cleaning, screenings, gravel and sand; preparing the foundation; marking the bay areas; pouring; levelling the surface; the non-slip finish; curing and finally ready for use. Other improvements to fence posts, silos and cowyards are shown.

results.title: Concrete city
results.creator_credit: Frontyard Films, Mandy King and Fabio Cavadini
results.brief_description: This thought-provoking film about a small community of working class people who live in the old wharfside Sydney suburb of Pyrmont, brings into question the notion of coummunity participation in major urban development schemes. The development, in this case, involves nothing less than the total destruction of a community and of valuable heritage sites, for the construction of a casino and a whole range of high rise commercial development. The community is “consulted” and “involved”, yet their own suggestions as to how best develop the area are largely ignored.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Frontyard Films, Mandy King and Fabio Cavadini

results.title: Concorde gives up smoking
results.creator_credit: British Aircraft Corporation and Aerospatiale France
results.brief_description: Production models of Concorde will have smoke-free engines. The imporvements made are illustrated by the comparison of production line engines with the prototypes.
